alert.note: Alert for Goshen County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 3:32PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Goshen County through 415 PM MDT... At 332 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northwest of Veteran, or 18 miles west of Torrington, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lingle, Fort Laramie, Fort Laramie National Historic Site and Hwy 85 At Dry Rawhide Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
